review.title: “It has been a learning experience”
review.pros: Pros – The people are very nice, and are very willing to help you learn new things.
review.cons: Cons – The upper management is very indecisive.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I would work on listening to your employees more.

review.title: “"Unstable work environment"”
review.pros: Pros – There were multiple employees with whom you could commiserate with, allowing for a small family-feel. Casual-dress; snacks provided.
review.cons: Cons – - Minimal pay and little to no benefits for the work that is expected- Incredibly unstable upper management style- often condescending and degrading in front of other employees; micromanaging- No opportunity for advancement, or the ability to work full-time; hours were reduced "indefinitely"
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Treat every member of staff as if they're valuable and can contribute something to the work environment. Do not blame your own in competencies on others; and expect cheerful results.

review.title: “Great place to work & learn!”
review.pros: Pros – Great place to learn the wholesale business of fashion jewelry. Company lets you be creative when given the opportunity. Great discount off merchandise.
review.cons: Cons – No bonus, only given jewelry as bonus.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Owner of the company is a good mentor and leader of the company.
